title: The Ink Black Heart
author: Robert Galbraith
description: Cormoran Strike investigates the murder of a controversial cartoonist, delving into the dark side of online fame.

title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry faces government opposition and forms 'Dumbledore's Army' to prepare for the return of Voldemort.

title: The 6:20 Man
author: David Baldacci
description: A former Army Ranger uncovers a conspiracy aboard his commuter train while working on Wall Street.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A proven framework for building good habits and breaking bad ones through tiny changes.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A lone astronaut must save Earth from extinction by solving an interstellar mystery.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who leaves her survivalist family and goes on to earn a PhD from Cambridge.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A criminal psychotherapist becomes obsessed with a woman who shot her husband and then stopped speaking.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind, exploring how Homo sapiens became Earth's dominant species.
